Human.name: Human
Human.description: The baseline human species, adaptable and widespread throughout Charted Space.

Aslan.name: Aslan
Aslan.description: Proud, leonine humanoids with a strong warrior culture and territorial instincts.
specialAbilities: Heightened Senses: +1 DM to Recon and Survival checks
traits: Cannot use weapons smaller than their hands

Vargr.name: Vargr
Vargr.description: Canine-descended humanoids known for their pack mentality and charismatic leadership.
specialAbilities: Pack Mentality: +1 DM to Leadership checks when leading other Vargr
Keen Senses: +1 DM to Investigate and Recon checks involving scent or hearing

Zhodani.name: Zhodani
Zhodani.description: Psychically gifted humans from the Zhodani Consulate, known for their mental disciplines.
specialAbilities: Psionic Potential: All Zhodani have PSI attribute starting at 2d6+2
Mental Discipline: +1 DM to resist mental effects and psionics

Vilani.name: Vilani
Vilani.description: Ancient human subspecies, the first to achieve interstellar travel, known for conservatism.
specialAbilities: Cultural Memory: +1 DM to Admin and Diplomat checks
Conservative Nature: +1 DM to resist new ideas or changes

Solomani.name: Solomani
Solomani.description: Humans from Terra (Earth), known for their diversity and adaptability.
specialAbilities: Diverse Heritage: May choose one skill at level 0 during character creation
Adaptable: +1 DM to one attribute roll during character generation
